item.description:
The topic of this event is how to have an effective, comfortable pricing conversation with prospective clients that works with your personality. We'll talk about how friendly, relationship-oriented professionals can stand strong on their pricing without losing the sale, sounding desperate or getting on that emotional-roller coaster.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-ro

Date: Thursday, Sept. 27, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is power maven and positive problem-solver Dina Eisenberg, JD. She understands the importance of speaking up for yourself in life and business. Dina has been a Senior VP at one of the nation’s largest financial institutions and consulted to leading organizations like Coca Cola, Harvard, Lexmark and more.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-ro

During this program you will learn:

  • How to talk about price without sounding desperate or getting on that emotional-roller coaster.
    Understand deeply what's so important about speaking up for yourself.
  • The important difference between setting the right price and saying it powerfully, and comfortably.
  • How friendly, relationship-oriented professionals can stand strong on their pricing without losing the sale.
  • The role of your mindset and the dangers of stinking thinking about money, value and self-esteem.
  • What to say to your spouse about your business.
  • The key components of a pricing conversation.
  • What are naked numbers and the clothes your price should wear.
  • What it takes to be fearless.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-ro
item.name: Say Your Price Powerfully!
